channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Login Block IPs
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Login Block IPs

item.title: CVE-2022-1579|2024-08-03T00:10:03.558Z -- unknown -- login%20block%20ips
item.description: The function check_is_login_page() uses headers for the IP check, which can be easily spoofed.

item.title: CVE-2022-3098|2024-08-03T01:00:10.522Z -- unknown -- login%20block%20ips
item.description: The Login Block IPs WordPress plugin through 1.0.0 does not have CSRF check in place when updating its settings, which could allow attackers to make a logged in admin change them via a CSRF attack
